## Shape.LeftInch property

Represents the horizontal offset of shape from its left column, in unit of inches.

```csharp
public double LeftInch { get; set; }
```

### Examples

```csharp

[C#]
if (shape.LeftInch == 3)
    shape.LeftInch = 1;
```
